title: Need help
body: First of all sorry for my English. I'm a 21yo guy livin in Italy. I try to be not depressed but that's what I am, I have quit my job cause it was too stressful. Left my girlfriend still dunno why. I started playin lol since I wake till I fall asleep even in my chair. I'm tryin to improve myself, id like to be part of a really good team one day but for I'm just a stupid workless boy who plays pc hated by his own family. How can I make lol a job? I really need to money to keep on livin. I tried suicide about 3 months ago, I used to go to the psychiatrist but he didn't help me that much. Should I kill myself? Should I keep on playin lol? Should I just find a job and start livin that normal life everyone is searching? I can't find a job that I like, university too expensive for my family and still don't know if I can study or I like it. Hope to find a solution
